cause.description:
Each and every year, thousands of alumni, parents and friends make proud PLU moments possible for talented, bright young men and women. Unrestricted annual gifts provide a steady foundation for the university's work and play an essential role in furthering the central tenets of our mission: thoughtful inquiry, service, leadership and care. Q Club is crucial to Pacific Lutheran University's ability to attract the very best students and make quality education affordable for all families.
Donors have the opportunity to support the areas listed below.
More information: www.plu.edu/qclub
1. Student Scholarships: to lessen students' financial worries, allowing to focus on what college is really about--academics.
2. Academic Excellence: to support faculty members seeking to expand and enrich their curriculum, involve students in research & inspire active learning
3. Campus Life: to support the many student activities that give balance to students' lives.
4. Area of Greatest Need: to give PLU the ability to respond to opportunities or needs as they arise.
cause.mission: Raise funds to support Quality education at PLU through Q Club.
